cause.description:
Most people have computers these days. Homeless people are people too, so they shouldn't be excluded.
Macbooks don't have diseases like PCs do. Homeless people are ill enough as it is, so we don't want to make things worse for them.
If homeless people had Macbooks, they could stay in touch with their other homeless buddies.
With google map's satellite view they could check out some great places to sleep.
1. Homeless people are equals.
2. Homeless people should be able to see what's happening on the internet too.
3. Macbooks are great!
cause.mission: Provide Macbook laptops for homeless people across north america
cause.name: Macbooks for the Homeless
